About Me

Pedro Medina

Hi! My Name is Pedro, and i am a Software Developer coming all the way from Venezuela. I found my passion for coding, and solving problems after spending most of my college career in the medical field. With the discipline and desire to strive for greatness i decided to pursue my true calling in Tech, and help bring creative projects to life, while developing world-class software solutions for my clients.

My Services

Website Development

I am proficient in HTML, CSS & JavaScript. I dedicate myself to craft a quality experience, writing every line of code to ensure the best performance, no bloated or messy code slowing down your site.

Graphic Design

Finding yourself in the need of a new logo, or perhaps your old one needs a touch up? Don't fret, we got you covered! Our own in-house graphic designer will be ready to take your branding to the next level!

Content Writing & SEO

We offer the latest SEO techniques, to give your website a boost in the search results using keyword centered content for blog posts, articles, or social media content.

Video Editing & Animation

The power of video Ads & Animation are proven to boost brand identity and client engagement which ends up leading to more sales for your business. Don't miss out developing content that put you above the rest!
